Time, Dr Freeman? is it really that time again?

Due to the Omnipotent effect, infamy, success and cult like following half-life attained in 1998, made any sequel to this series in equal to its predecessor almost mathematically impossible. But in the lead up in 2004, Valve showed us mortals a vision of immortality. What appeared to be witchcraft to I, was what was to be Half-Life 2, 6 years later. Not only did this kick of Steams Debut but it gave rise to its dominance in the digital games market. This also coincided with Counter strike Source, which was to be a huge critical online success that followed. It was an absolute critical time within the foundations of Valve and Steam which see now 18 years later.

To put it bluntly, the hype to this release was bigger than Jesus Resurrection. When that day came in November 2004 and I remember it succinctly, was a feeling of angst, excitement and unknown as I could finally continue the story of the Freeman. Would it be good? would it live up the expectations? It is cited as one of the best games of all time along with original it has won 39 game of the year awards.

The game is set 20 years after the Black Mesa Incident and you, as the protagonist Gordon Freeman find yourself within an alien infested planet, specifically an Eastern-European district called City 17. As the story progresses, advances and ends, things will become much clearer to an extent. Some questions will be answered and some will not be, but this is typical of the games enigma like approach since its inception that leaves us with mystery about something bigger and better to come. Many familiar faces will be seen both friend and foe, which brings much loved nostalgia to when we were fighting our way out in black Mesa in 98'.

The game is broken down in to chapters which keep to its conservative roots, many intriguing and exotics areas of the district will entertain you, on both a thrilling, action packed and horror filled adventure.... "we dont go to Ravenholm". The game play is simply futuristic for the time it was in and clearly redefined modern shooters for the early 00's. The physics are absolutely realistic and the upgraded source engine with its graphical representations really caused computers to struggle. The animations, characters models, textures are just simply a sight to behold. The game sticks to previous authenticity with its mechanics and added new weapons (gravity gun), new monsters and general interactivity with the environment during exploration. Much of the physics are extensively portrayed by the player during puzzles that need to be overcome during the game storyline or simply manipulating items during combat. Combat is another beast on its own, being able to use any object (including explosive or sharp) almost to attack/defend, use traps, many weapons at your disposal, with intelligent AI trying to out maneuver you...it does get fairly creative.

As true as the half-life game is, no dialogue by the protagonist, no cut scenes and the majority of the game is scripted and unfolds as you progress. You do progress through means such as teleportation and such makeshift vehicles like the  hovercraft and buggy. There is much half-life reminiscence and reminders throughout the game , such as simple sound bytes, symbols which really bring much excessive sentiment.

I could go on forever, this is absolutely the game of the decade of the 00's. It was beyond its time and still sits true today like the Mona Lisa. Receiving a Guinness World Record, in my opinion it should be sitting amongst the gods on Mt Olympus.

игра просто лучшая по атмосфере, все портит гемплей, он очень скучный, по крайней мере в начале, просто бегаешь и убиваешь, но атмосфера просто что тот с чем то, чувствуется как будто этот город живой, кто то что то делает, все проработано, но уровни иногда очень слодные, не понятно куда бежать и т.д, надеюсь дальше гемплей будет лучше

This was a game that was worth every penny. My dad and I bonded over this game when I was in high school, and I still play it. Yes... killing headcrabs and zombies together as father and son... just as it should be.

Joguei completo pela primeira vez agora em 2022, incrível ver como quando o jogo é bem feito ele perdura por todo esse tempo, é um jogo que na época foi revolucionário, hoje em dia para jogar os gráficos claramente deram uma envelhecida porém você consegue jogar na boa, muito raro ver bugs e o jogo tem uma história sensacional, recomendo.

It is practically impossible to say something new about Half-Life 2. Its a great game with great weapons, enemies, levels, and a fantastic story. It is consistently on the top of best games of all time lists and will probably always be there. Even today, it is an amazing game that has aged quite well. If you have not played this game, play it. If you have played this game, go play it again.

PROS:
- Story line was groundbreaking and builds on the first game intelligently
- Great weapon roster that eliminates all the fat from the first game
- Exceptional enemies with fantastic AI that is still some of the best there is
- Great level design with fantastic set piece after set piece
- Solid performance and no bugs encountered
- Good value, taking ~ 10 hours to complete on a first time playthrough

CONS:
- Some of the early missions drag a bit
I am battling this game's engine so hard...
Half life but a full on experience, awesome game I do recommend
Oyun dünyasının babası, anası, amcası, dayısı kısacası herşeyi.

I am a 45 yo father, probably one of the oldest people playing this game. I am a single farther to my Son, who is 14 now. My son got this game for Christmas from his uncle, so we installed it on his computer and he started playing. By the end of the week he had 24 hours on this game. This was horrible for me, as it was already hard for me to find ways to spend time with my son, as he is always out with his friends or just, watching YouTube. So i decided to make a Steam account and get this game to see if I could maybe play alongside him. loaded into the game, made my character and world and started playing but I was stuck on what you where supposed to do. I asked my Son for help and he hosted a game for me to join. loved it as it was the best time had spent with my Son since my wife had died. This game has ever since brought me and my son closer again and now we actually spend time together outside the house together as well. This game reminded me that there's fun to be had in everything, and it has brought both me and my Son many happy memories.
great game took me 10 hours to beat it, now im gonna go play ep 1&2
gordon loooks kinda like walter whtie......

Toda continuação, seja de um filme, HQ ou jogo, tem que ser tão bom se não , superior ao seu antecessor e Half-Life 2 consegue, como surpreende. Incrível como um FPS pode trazer design, história imersiva e reflexiva e um motor gráfico (Source Engine), com uma das físicas mais impressionantes da época e que ainda surpreende até os dias de hoje.
Se não jogou o primeiro e nem o segundo, aproveita que tá tendo a summer sale com várias promoções e corre atrás. Afinal, é melhor gastar dinheiro em uma ótima experiência, do que qualquer coisa aleatória.

One of the best. Doesn´t age, never gets old. They don´t make ´em like this anymore. If for some wird reason you havent played this masterpiece, do it, you won´t regret it.

I love this game. There is no other way to put it since it really ticks a lot of boxes for what a good game should be. It has amazing gameplay it plays exactly like portal and csgo with the source mechanics so you will feel right at home if you have played anything on source. It has amazing story telling without the need for cutscenes. It still holds up in 2022 as a really good game that is worth its price and I wouldn't even wait for a sale if I was going to buy it again since I think it is fairly priced for me personally. (the sales are pretty good though)
